Welcome to menu’s documentation!¶

menu

menu.menu

menu.notebook

class menu.notebook.Note(memo, tags='')¶

Bases: object

Represent a note in the notebook. Match against a string in searches and store tags for each note.

match(filter)¶

Determine if this note matches the filter text. Return True if it matches, False otherwise.

Search is case sensitive and matches both text and tags.

class menu.notebook.Notebook¶

Bases: object

Represent a collection of notes that can be tagged, modified, and searched.

modify_memo(note_id, memo)¶

Find the note with the given id and change its memo to the given value.

modify_tags(note_id, tags)¶

Find the note with the given id and change its tags to the given value.

new_note(memo, tags='')¶

Create a new note and add it to the list.

search(filter)¶

Find all notes that match the given filter string.

class menu.menu.Menu¶

Bases: object

Display a menu and respond to choices when run.

display_menu()¶
modify_note()¶
quit()¶
run()¶

Display the menu and respond to choices.
